Modifies the point in time {{c|*this}} represents by one tick of the {{tt|duration}}.

If {{tt|d_}} is a member variable holding the duration (i.e., time since epoch) of this {{tt|time_point}} object, 
@1@ Equivalent to {{c|++d_; return *this;}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|return time_point(d_++)}}.
@3@ Equivalent to {{c|--d_; return *this;}}.
@4@ Equivalent to {{c|return time_point(d_--);}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1,3@ A reference to this {{tt|time_point}} after modification.
@2,4@ A copy of the {{tt|time_point}} made before modification.
